event_text: m_c was out in the territory when a large loach passed by, though when {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} attempted to run away the loach had already grabbed and eaten {PRONOUN/m_c/object}.

history.reg_death: m_c was eaten by a loach.

event_text: m_c was fighting a lizard, however in {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} distraction a loach had snuck up on the two and consumed both of them
